title: Where is the Search Key on Chromebook? A Keyboard Guide

steps.title: It's on the left side of your keyboard and looks like a magnifying glass .
steps.content: It's on the left side of your keyboard and looks like a magnifying glass . If you don't have the magnifying glass key, you may have a Launcher key, which features a large colored-in circle. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Pressing this Search key and typing will bring up a list of results related to your search:
steps.content: Pressing this Search key and typing will bring up a list of results related to your search: both files on your Chromebook and results from the web. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Change its function.
steps.content: Change its function. Go to Settings (press Alt + Shift + S ) and navigate to "Keyboard." From there, you can change how the Search key works, like using it as a Caps Lock instead. [3] X Research source
